[/vc_column_text][toggles style=”minimal”][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ title=”What is House of Sparta?”][vc_column_text]We are planning to launch Feb 1st[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ title=”How many NFTs will there be?”][vc_column_text]Initially 4600 Spartans will be available to mint on Solana

Later down the line, 4600 Persians will be available to mint[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ title=”Will there be royalties?”][vc_column_text]Royalties will go to the community treasury, which will be used directly for collectible airdrops, floor burns, lotteries raids, and project development.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ title=”Is there an advantage in game if i buy an NFT?”][vc_column_text]Yes, you will start the game with a larger province and army with greater attributes[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ title=”Where can I buy a Spartan NFT?”][vc_column_text]We were the first ever launch on fractal, you can also head over to their site to pick up Spartans and airdrops on secondary – https://www.fractal.is/houseofsparta[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ title=”Do Spartan NFTs have utility?”][vc_column_text]Absolutely, they entitle you to raids and airdrops that are currently ongoing! They will also grant you access to the game and a later ability to stake your NFTs. [/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ title=”How will NFTs be used in game?”][vc_column_text]Holding a Spartan or a Persian in your wallet will grant you access to the game.
